Name: Barbarian
Review: Although i really liked the phone which clearly says (RENEWED PREMIUM) i noticed on the order details it says (NEW) and because of that the warranty (Replace/Refund) was not showing 1 year for premium renewed products instead it was showing 90 days! Really upset about that and tried to call Amazon to resolve the issue and ask them to make the changes to reflect what i bought they failed to do so!! I am returning this and placing a new order and hoping this time it wont be an issue as if i am being charged premium price i expect i get premium service

Name: Grayson Carter
Review: Didn't want to pay for a new device so I figured why not try the renewed. The device looks new and came free of any previous user data. It came with 90% battery health which doesn't really matter to me. I'm not sure how many hours screen on time I will get as I've only had it for a few days but so far hasn't died at any time. The charger and cable they ship with it are not good as the cable can't sync with itunes and the charger is very low power but you can pick up both for very low cost pretty much anywhere

Name: degrab
Summary: EASE OF USE AND TRIPLE CAMERAS & VIDEO CAPABILITIES
Review: IPHONE 12 PRO EASY FOR BEGINNERS TO USE. HAD ASSISTANCE SETTING UP AND TRASFERING DATA FROM OLD PHONE SAMSUNG J7 WITH HELP OF SALES REP AT LOCAL T-MOBILE STORE. 99% OF PROGRAMS, DATA AND PHOTOS WERE TRANSFERED. ONCE COMPLETED TRANSFER, CUSTOMIZING TO MY PERSONAL SETTINGS WAS FAIRLY EASY. PHONE IS VERY COMFORTABLE TO HOLD. MUCH LOUDER THAN MY OLD PHONE. SCREEN MAKES TEXTING EASIER TOO AS LETTERS AND NUMBERS JUST THE RIGHT SIZE FOR MY FINGERS. SCROLLING IE FACEBOOK, YOUTUBE, ECT. IS REAL SMOOTH. PICTURES ARE EXCELLENT IN THE PHOTO ALBUMS. YOU CAN ALSO EDIT PICTURES IN THE ALBUM A HUGHE PLUS. THE THREE CAMERAS ARE EXCELLENT AS WELL AS THE PORTARIT MODE AND THE VIDEO. VIDEO IS SO LIFE LIKE AND THE COLORS ARE FANTASTIC. THE NIGHT VIEW WORKS BEAUTIFULLY AS THE PICTURES COME OUT LIKE THEY WERE SHOT IN DAYLIGHT. I BOUGHT THE IPHONE 12 PRO RENEWED. BATTERY LIFE WAS 96% AND I FOUND NO SCRATCHES, DENTS OR DINGS. IT WAS JUST LIKE A BRAND NEW CAMERA OUT OF THE BOX. IT DID HAVE DIFFERENT CHARGING CABLE AND POWER BLOCK WHICH WERE APPLE CERTIFIED. I HAVE HAD THIS PHONE FOR ABOUT 2 MONTHS NOW AND I LOVE THIS PHONE. THIS IS MY FIRST IPHONE AND THE BATTERY LIFE IS GOOD BUT COULD BE BETTER IF IT HAD A BIGGER BATTERY. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PHONE AND I DON'T THINK YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED.

Name: Daniel Olivares
Summary: iPhone is iPhone. Good and reliable. And secure!
Review: Love the phone. Been wanting it since it came out and finally put some money together to buy it. I do must say I‚Äôm happy to be back with iPhone. I was stuck with a Motorola G4 for almost a year and a half and that phone took a beaten and I finally got tired of it lagging and been a bit of an annoyance to navigate. This phone is clean, sturdy, and very well put together. Love the cameras, I blew my friends mind when I showed him it could take pictures in the dark on SELFIE mode. Even for a refurbished phone it still looks brand new, no dings nor scratches. Looked very clean and smooth when I unwrapped it. And yea unwrapped it. Would‚Äôve prefer getting the whole ‚Äúbrand new fresh off the box‚Äù experience. But I‚Äôm not complaining. They secured it pretty well. Package might not be filled with bubble wrap but this phone is durable. All they needed was to wrap it around with some foam and the phone got to me in one piece, looked brand new. Didn‚Äôt even have to squint my eye I swear.Side note I didn‚Äôt put a rating on the finger print because I do not know whether this phone has one. I haven‚Äôt bothered the face recognition is enough. It won‚Äôt rwcognize your face with a mask on (obviously) but it does recognize from all kinds of angles. Literally even as far as your arms can reach. I‚Äôve gotten myself an Apple Watch lately the 7 specifically and they go hand in hand love them both. I‚Äôve had the phone for 4 months now and it still looks brand new, I still take it out of the case and feel it. I did spent a grand on it, which for a lot of people it is pretty pricy but so far I haven‚Äôt had a complain or a regret for buying a thousand dollar phone. Which was a HUGE thing before I bought it. Maybe it‚Äôs because I‚Äôm finally back with iPhone money doesn‚Äôt matter if you‚Äôre happy really.Camera is crisp btw.

I can hear them fairly clearly but they have all sort of issues hearing me. This is my second purchase since the first one had cracks on the screen. Dont be like me, make sure that if you do purchase, thoroughly test it before sending it off to Canada as a gift! Save yourself the disappointment and expenses. Avoid these and just put the extra mone and buy from apple refurb or buy New if you can. Take my advice

As I have said before, I have bought other phones from the Amazon Renewed program and have never has a problem. In this situation I have given the seller the same information that I‚Äôm sharing here and they are giving me ‚Äúthe run around‚Äù. I only want a replacement for the phone as I need it for work. I finally gave up the idea of a used phone, and just went out and got a new phone.  Yes it was expensive, but it should last a long time.
